Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I can ask GenAI more questions than I can ask my teacher due to time restrictions. GenAI answers my questions immediately but you can be waiting a while for a teacher to answer (understandably).

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI doesn't give me a riddle of an answer.
